casebody.data:
HOWELL
v.
PARK E. CARE & REHAB. CTR. 2018-0943 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 12, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Motion for leave to file amended memorandum in support of jurisdiction granted. O'Donnell, J., dissents and would accept the appeal. O'Connor, C.J., would deny the motion for leave to file amended memorandum in support of jurisdiction as moot. DeGenaro, J., not participating.
